last_episode_to_air.name: Because Vegas
last_episode_to_air.overview: When Jake's tech company suddenly goes under, he's faced with the ultimate dilemma. Dusty is haunted by an old mistake in the form of a new employee on the Saints' staff.

name: Sin City Saints
overview: An off-beat comedy set in the front office of a fictional pro basketball expansion team and centered on Jake Tullus, a Silicon Valley tycoon whose lifelong dream was to buy a pro basketball team but quickly finds he’s in over his head. The group he assembled to run Las Vegas’ first pro sports team won’t be much help.

episodes.name: The Fool Monty
episodes.overview: When a bone-headed incident threatens to ruin the Saints' season, owner Jake Tullis and his staff jump into crisis mode. The league sends a gorgeous, no-nonsense lawyer, Dusty Halford, to oversee a disgruntled Jake.

episodes.name: Smoke and Mirrors
episodes.overview: An old issue rears its ugly head for Jake. As Dusty plots his demise, she has a Vegas fling to get over her ex. Byron and Sam attempt to convince a player to come out of retirement to play for the Saints.

episodes.name: Gone Catfishing
episodes.overview: LaDarius falls in love with a girl he meets online. Byron is bullied by the team's enforcer, Artahk Sandov, because he's not getting enough playing time.

episodes.name: Mrs. Wu's Tang
episodes.overview: Wu Lee, a Chinese basketball star, visits Las Vegas. Jake and Dusty each have their own methods to convince him to join the Saints.

episodes.name: A Basket Full of Rainbows
episodes.overview: Cell phone footage of a vicious rant by Coach Doug from the Saints' locker room leaks and Jake and Dusty battle over how to handle it.

episodes.name: You Booze, You Lose
episodes.overview: Jake is challenged by a local radio sports host to prove he cares more about the Saints' season than his lavish partying lifestyle.

episodes.name: Urine God's Hands Now
episodes.overview: In order to secure funding for a new arena, Jake and Dusty must win an ultra-conservative councilman's vote. LaDarius has to pass a random drug test.

episodes.name: Because Vegas
episodes.overview: When Jake's tech company suddenly goes under, he's faced with the ultimate dilemma. Dusty is haunted by an old mistake in the form of a new employee on the Saints' staff.
